attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ban the lot there no good. the only people who sign these things are people with no grounding in reality and too much time trawling and searching the internet for petitions to sign. Do you honestly believe these people even know what they are signing. Half of them are just regurgitating the thoughts of others they watched on Morning television.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
